title: Introduction
content:
## Content
- frame of reference
- Inside the box 

## Padding
- Increases the size of the box
- will include baackground color of the element

## Border
- Goes around the padding of the element

## Margin
- Spacing outside the border
- Separates elements from each other


## Height and Width
- Controls the size of an elements content

## Overflow
- Control on element that is too big for the container
